statements: UPDATE access_control SET username = 'john.doe', role = 'admin' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE access_control SET role = 'admin', username = 'adminuser' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE users SET username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1

UPDATE permissions SET permission_name = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', password='new_password' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE roles SET description='Updated description' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE users SET password='newpassword123' WHERE username='alice'
UPDATE permissions SET permission_type='read_write' WHERE resource='files'
UPDATE user_permissions SET permission = 'read' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_roles SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_permissions SET permission = 'edit' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE role_permissions SET permission = 'delete' WHERE role = 'admin';
UPDATE users SET access_level = 2 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE roles SET role_name = 'Moderator' WHERE role_id = 2;

UPDATE user_roles SET role_id = 3 WHERE user_id = 2 AND role_id = 2;
